query: ALTER TABLE static_site_upload_history ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_upload_history_pk PRIMARY KEY(upload_id), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_upload_history_fk_static_site_id FOREIGN KEY(static_site_id) REFERENCES static_site(id), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_upload_history_fk_uploaded_by FOREIGN KEY(uploaded_by) REFERENCES "user"(id), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_upload_history_uq_upload_id_static_site_id UNIQUE(upload_id, static_site_id), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_upload_history_fk_upload_id_resource_id FOREIGN KEY(upload_id) REFERENCES resource(id);
